title: State Machine Template
description: An interactive p5.js template for creating state machine visualizations with transitions, history tracking, and dynamic controls. Demonstrates a 5-state machine with 8 transitions.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: State Machine
Finite Automata
Interactive Visualization
Computer Science
Educational Technology
coverage: Foundational computer science concept applicable to software design, game development, and system modeling
audience: Students, educators, and developers learning about state machines and finite automata
